concept.title: Sending Cache Ready Messages to the Server
concept.shortdesc: After a durable client connects and initializes its cache, regions, cache listeners, and any interest registration, it invokes readyForEvents to indicate to the servers that the client is ready to receive any messages accumulated for it.
